website_summaries.verdict: Hands down the best of everything Britax offers in a car seat – safety features, rugged construction, and versatility as baby grows.
pros: Utilizes the brand's impressive features to keep baby safe: secure ClickTight installation, triple-layer side impact protection, SafeCell steel frame, and padding throughout
Convertible to accommodate newborns to toddlers
cons: Does not have a cupholder like some other models
Very heavy and some users feel like it is bulky

customer_reviews.title: It is comfortable and looks really safe
customer_reviews.text: I was a britax fan. But I am really frustrated with this carseat. It is comfortable and looks really safe. But after 9 months of using the belt inside the carseat is ripped. We didn't do anything unusual. I could not even imagine it can happen with the belt, it is supposed to be the best quality because it is about safety of children.
customer_reviews.author: Irina

customer_reviews.title: Super safe, comfy
customer_reviews.text: We did our research. This car seat has it all. Super safe, comfy, and it's ranked as having one of the lowest concentrations of harmful chemicals used as flame retardant.
customer_reviews.author: Caitlin Elizabeth Doty

customer_reviews.title: fabric doesn't hold up after having the seat for a week...
customer_reviews.text: I have been a fan of Britax in the past for my newborn. However, we needed an upgrade and I purchased this seat not even ONE WEEK AGO and the fabric is already showing wear. The fabric is worn in a way that looks like rubbing or friction, this is very surprising after having this seat for a week and not to mention my kid has only taken 2 trips in it. I am very disappointed, I paid over $300 dollars for this seat and expected a better quality. For how much they charge you would think that they would put better quality fabric on their carseats. It would be nice for this to get rectified...
customer_reviews.author: JS

customer_reviews.title: The communication with Britax customer service was pretty straightforward, and after sending pictures of the broken ...
customer_reviews.text: While I appreciate the solidity of the seat and safety that the brand promises, the seat is very heavy and somewhat difficult to use. The belt extension mechanism (click tight button) was difficult to operate from the beginning and then finally broke at an opportune time when moving the seat between cars. The communication with Britax customer service was pretty straightforward, and after sending pictures of the broken button and explanation of the issue, we were sent a new seat. The new seat has been working fine, though still a bit heavy for me. I wish it came with a cupholder built in like some other car seats.
customer_reviews.author: ANASTASIA P.

customer_reviews.title: Very safe but would make a minor tweak to design.
customer_reviews.text: One of the safest seats on the market, but the reason I didn't give it a 5 star is because of the shoulder straps length. The seat is a litle bulky anyway and in the winter months when there are extra clothes to contend with too, another two inches of strap would be most helpful. Aside from this relatively minor issue, I feel totally safe with my baby in this seat. Would still recommend for purchase, but buyer be informed. Installation was super easy too. Really like the ease and simplicity of that.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Good seat, not ideal for newborns
customer_reviews.text: I do really like that this car seat is suitable for weights 5-65lbs. We had it installed by traffic safety officers at our local police station. We had to fit it to our son. It wasn't easy (he was 8lbs 5oz at birth) and is swamped by the straps and buckles. I watched all the Britax info videos, read the manuals and other reviews. We still really struggled so called customer service. They gave us some suggestions, which have helped. In hindsight, it's not ideal for a newborn but we'll persist with it as he's growing so fast now.
customer_reviews.author: Miss C

customer_reviews.title: Britaxb is stuck in car. There is a video ...
customer_reviews.text: Britaxb is stuck in car. There is a video of how to release a Jamed seat online, but I can access the lock without releasing the seat from the buckle which is also stuck. Britax hotline isn't 24 hours...
customer_reviews.author: dog

customer_reviews.title: Sturdiest seat I've ever seen
customer_reviews.text: Incredibly safe and sturdy. Be aware....this car seat is HEAVY. That being said its heavy for a good reason and does not budge once it's latched in. It's as close to simple as you can get as far as car seat installation goes. Not fool proof but definitely 99.9% easier than any other seat I've seen or had. My daughter unfortunately got car sick and we had to remove all pieces to wash it. There are videos online showing you exactly how to remove it. It's not safe to wash in the laundry machine so everything had to be gently hand washed (kinda a pain) but everything looked brand new still afterwards.
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: The seat feels very sturdy and safe
customer_reviews.text: The seat feels very sturdy and safe. However I agree with other people saying the crotch harness is a bit short. My 2.5yo child hasn't complained about it hurting her, but I feel it could be a bit more comfortable/adjustable. I've tried to loosen up the shoulders' straps, but I think I reached the maximum, and it's still hard to buckle up.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love this carseat!
customer_reviews.text: Love this car seat. Purchased it when my child was about 8 months old. We moved him up from his original carseat, the Britax BSAFE. He seemed to like this one a lot more because it's roomier and he can sit up more which he likes. The carseat seems really sturdy. It's easy to take my child in and out and I can do it pretty quickly too. The ClickTight install is pretty easy too and I love the no thread harness. The straps rarely get tangled. We haven't really had too many issues.
customer_reviews.author: Halo5

customer_reviews.title: Love love love this car seat
customer_reviews.text: Love love love this car seat! I did months of research before finally deciding to purchase this one. So glad I did! My 11 month old fits comfortably in it. I love the new click tight system. Super easy to install. The only con about it is that it is a tad heavy but nothing I can't handle.
customer_reviews.author: JTboymom

customer_reviews.title: Really nice and safe
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 12 month old daughter because she was too tall for the Britax infant seat. As other reviewers have mentioned, it is very heavy. Otherwise I have not found any downsides. It it very comfortable for my now 19 month old daughter and seems to be very safe with all the padding.
customer_reviews.author: Navi

customer_reviews.title: I absolutely love this seat
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this seat! It is the easiest carseat I have ever used. When removing the carseat always remember to unbuckle the seatbelt first before turning the click tight button and you will have no issues with this seat. If you turn the click tight button first the pressure is so tight that the button might get stuck. Luckily I read about this in the reviews so I was prepared for this before I purchased the seat. I have had multiple seats and nothing is as easy as the click tight mechanism that Britax provides. LOVE IT!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Safety and quality
customer_reviews.text: Great quality and durability. Love this brand. Second car seat in this brand. Would buy again. Appreciate knowing my child is safe.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Saved my grandson's life.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this car seat 2 years ago for my now 5 year old grandson. He was recently in a serious crash in which the car was totaled. My daughter sustained some injuries, mostly from the airbags deploying, but he came out completely unharmed. We have had four different car seats in different vehicles over the years, but I can honestly say the Britax Advocate surpasses them all. My husband just ordered another one. Thank you, Britax, that my grandson is alive and well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The mechanism in the seat broke somehow and made it ...
customer_reviews.text: The mechanism in the seat broke somehow and made it extremely difficult to use. Customer support did exchange it but it took forever and this is a product that one cannot do without, and much too expensive to buy another while awaiting the replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Tim-Jenn-MDH

customer_reviews.title: The best of the best!
customer_reviews.text: My husbands truck got into the accident , which was really bad that all air bags were deployed and his truck was totaled. However, our kids didn't get hurt at all. This car seat may be slightly expensive compared with others in the market, however, it is worth it. I highly recommend this one.
customer_reviews.author: Ai

customer_reviews.title: Ill-fitted seat beat
customer_reviews.text: I chose this carseat after a lot of research. Unfortunately the very short central buckle keeps seat belt positioned over my child's thighs rather than hips making an unsafe fit. I actually bought two because I have twins. My 2 year olds are small to average sized at 23 & 25 lbs just to give other buyers an idea of fit.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle R Bahr

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable seat, well-engineered and well made
customer_reviews.text: We have loved this seat. The release button and click tightener make it easy to get my wiggley kid in and out! The seat is comfortable and there is a padded piece that protects little legs and tummy from a hot buckle. The padding on this is much better than the graco we initially bought from target. I highly recommend this seat!
customer_reviews.author: Alex Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Quality and comfort
customer_reviews.text: This seat is so easy to install. It is heavy however so not quite a seat I would want to move in and out of our cars. I also have a Britax Advocate that is not the clicktight. This seat is by far superior. It feels so nice. The materials are great. We did have our foam padding break and the seat was replaced by amazon.
customer_reviews.author: jvoerste

customer_reviews.title: Always have and always will love Britax and the lengths they go to ensure the ...
customer_reviews.text: Always have and always will love Britax and the lengths they go to ensure the safety of our children. This is the third seat we have purchased of this kind. And fourth Britax overall. Quality can’t be matched! They last forever!
customer_reviews.author: Thesearlenest

customer_reviews.title: Wanted to love, but too many small issues.
customer_reviews.text: Wanted to love this seat, we have the B safe and it was a great infant seat. How we the advocate did not work for us. The straps were not able to maintain evenness. One was always longer than the other. I would reset it and then it would be off. The recline in our 2012 Yukon was not enough, the kiddo was still slumped forward when he slept in the furthest back position. Lastly, no latch system which is what I would prefer. Wanted to like this, but for our needs wouldn't work and the straps being uneven constantly was a deal breaker.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Worth the $, fabulous car seat!
customer_reviews.text: Highly recommend, worth the money! What could ever be more important than your child’s safety? This car seat is great as they grow and I feel 100% safe with our daughter in it. Easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Michele Hills

customer_reviews.title: Great car seat and you can't argue with the safety ...
customer_reviews.text: Great car seat and you can't argue with the safety ratings. Does have a snug fit for my chunker, so I'm a little worried how long it will grow with him. He hates it and cries whenever we buckle him in. But still worth every penny for the safety.
customer_reviews.author: Eryn M Paxton

customer_reviews.title: Love my car seat!
customer_reviews.text: Love Britax car seats. Easy to install. Click tight works great. Would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent car seat!
customer_reviews.text: I love Britax! I recently purchased the Graco Forever and returned for this seat. It's worth the extra money and so easy to install. Very happy with this product. Keep your kids rear-facing as long as possible!
customer_reviews.author: VFKnights

customer_reviews.title: Very difficult to put child in and take out. ...
customer_reviews.text: Very difficult to put child in and take out. Also this seat takes up a lot of room I can barley fit in our Highlander with this behind driver seat. Which is a problem since we have twins. I wouldn't buy unless you have a large SUV.
customer_reviews.author: Charles R Moore

customer_reviews.title: Still seems super sturdy and safe but...
customer_reviews.text: This car seat has most of the great features of the older model. The reason for 3 stars instead 5 is the the LATCH attachment. The old model was super easy to attach to LATCH using a simple push button release. The newer model has the heavy duty clip used on less expensive car seats. I'm sure it's quite safe, just far more tedious to remove and install.
customer_reviews.author: Tabatha Stephens

customer_reviews.title: Great Car Seat!
customer_reviews.text: This is our second Britax USA Advocate ClickTight Convertible Car Seat that we purchased and we love it! Its not cheap but for simple install features + added safety it was money well spent. It's not light so if you are planning on moving this from car to car I'd look at other options. Great car seat!!
customer_reviews.author: Mike's Wireless

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Quality!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality. Solid frame and well padded. So glad I had this car seat when we were recently blindsided by an oblivious driver. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: DIY Mommy

customer_reviews.title: Recommended
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install and adjust, toddler seems comfy and content. This is our second advicate. Love how sturdy it feels and how Britax has an excellent safety record.
customer_reviews.author: Alli

customer_reviews.title: Don't save a buck, just buy the best to keep your angel safe.
customer_reviews.text: A great seat and our daughter loves it. Attaches nicely with the lift up seat to allow for the seat belt to easily be but in place. We are using it only facing forward as our daughter was old enough. Solid well constructed seat. Safety first, hence why we chose this seat.
customer_reviews.author: Jonsku

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THIS CAR SEAT
customer_reviews.text: LOVE THIS CAR SEAT!!! I have two of these for my car and my mother's car. Love it. Makes me feel better knowing that my child is in a safe, top of the line car seat. Worth the money. sturdy, durable, heavy duty, thick pads. I would buy this car seat over any other seat available.
customer_reviews.author: Leah

customer_reviews.title: The Model being sold is E1A265Q manufactured May 2, 2016
customer_reviews.text: This is the newest model of the car seat. That means it will not fall under any of the current recalls. This unit has all of the corrections Britax is very quick and responsive to the safety of the child sitting within the seat. These seats are built well and I have found over the past 4 years of buying them for my three children I haven't regretted one of these car seat. Yes I have had car seats effected by recalls from Britax but I am notified very quickly to stop using and I have got repair parts overnight.
customer_reviews.author: Michael O.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent choice for safety, comfort and ease of use
customer_reviews.text: Second advocate, we love it. Not only are the straps so easy to adjust, it seems comfortable and we feel confident that it's a safer car seat.
customer_reviews.author: Stacey

customer_reviews.title: great and safe! comfortable for my baby
customer_reviews.text: very safe and sturdy car sear. i had a different kind to start and my baby grew out of it . this one seems to be more comfortable for my little girl.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love this car seat!
customer_reviews.text: Before purchasing I read some reviews that I wasn't pleased to see, but so far we love it and haven't had any issues! It is pricey, but definitely worth the extra money and peace of mind knowing our daughter is well protected in this seat. Installation and strap adjustments are super easy, despite what I've read lol. Overall really happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Dani

customer_reviews.title: Great child seat
customer_reviews.text: Great child seat. I’m on the 3rd grandchild now and have had no issues. Keeps them safe and secure when traveling.
customer_reviews.author: Arch T.

customer_reviews.title: Safe
customer_reviews.text: This think is indeed a tank. Heavy and hard to move from one car to another, but a small price to pay for safety! The actually click tight install was ao easy, giving comfort knowing anyone can install it correctly. We did have minor issues getting the straps even, but it was an easy fix. Always feel like Britax is the way to go when buying a carseat.
customer_reviews.author: Julie Matanich

customer_reviews.title: Great for tall big babies
customer_reviews.text: Our big baby outgrew his infant car seat by the time he was three months old , so we got him this one and he lives it. Road trips are no longer an uncomfortable experience
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Quality item
customer_reviews.text: Really solid. Only complaint is the straps leave marks on my 1 year old's thighs. I bought this after returning a grace headwise 65, which was awful.
customer_reviews.author: ag

customer_reviews.title: I love out easy it is to get Baby in and ...
customer_reviews.text: I love out easy it is to get Baby in and out. Setting it up, however, took about 5x as long as the Chicco, which is not as friendly once installed.
customer_reviews.author: JoshPants

customer_reviews.title: Bulky, difficult to install
customer_reviews.text: Contrary to the manufacturer's claim, this seat is not easy to install. The ClickTight feature only makes it heavy and complicated, with no clear benefits. In fact, you cannot make small adjustments to the seat's inclination without removing the toddler and uninstalling the seat. Although it appears to be safe, the one star is because the instruction manual is so badly written. Overall, it seems like an overkill and would only make everything more difficult.
customer_reviews.author: G.

customer_reviews.title: Difficult to use if you want to use anchors and ...
customer_reviews.text: Difficult to use if you want to use anchors and not a seatbelt. Way too big for my 2013 Subaru Crosstrek. Returned product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: You can just tell its well put together and a great design. It is a little bigger than I ...
customer_reviews.text: This seat is well worth the money!! You can just tell its well put together and a great design. It is a little bigger than I thought but my child's safety is my biggest concern when driving around. Easy for me to install and just took a couple of times to get used to when putting baby in the car seat.
customer_reviews.author: Tom

customer_reviews.title: We have this seat and a cheaper one. I ...
customer_reviews.text: We have this seat and a cheaper one. I avoid taking my son in the other car so that I can use this nicer car seat over the cheap one. There really is a difference.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Made in the USA vs competitor's Chinese construction
customer_reviews.text: Easiest Install procedure I have seen. The deciding factor on this seat vs the Chicco Nextfit was weighing the cost of a USA steel frame constructed seat which is more expensive to a Chinese made plastic seat (I have the Chicco Keyfit30 and it is a fine product). I trust the domestic myself and paid the extra cost for the Britax and am glad I did. The Clicktight feature is also one heck of a great idea. No regrets. Amazon gets an A+ for quick processing and delivery as well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don’t do it
customer_reviews.text: Terrible quality. the polystyrene inside one of my britax carseat is broken since year 1.
customer_reviews.author: Celerfa

customer_reviews.title: Excellent. Very expensive
customer_reviews.text: Excellent. Very expensive, but solid as a rock. Note that is is pretty heavy if you are a frequent flier. I'd recommend buying the Britax travel bag in that instant.
customer_reviews.author: HH

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The best car seats. I have three, one for each grandchild.
customer_reviews.author: Scout

customer_reviews.title: I love how easy this seat is to install
customer_reviews.text: I love how easy this seat is to install. I'm using this in the back of my Dodge Charger but only occasionally. With traditional car seats installation is always a struggle. I can get this installed in under a minute and it's rock solid.
customer_reviews.author: Cosmin Stejerean

customer_reviews.title: Love Britax!
customer_reviews.text: Love Britax! If you intend to move around the carseat from car to car this is not the car seat for you. Its very heavy and I wouldn't recommend for traveling. However, we LOVE this car seat, my daughter is very comfy and secure.
customer_reviews.author: Y Jay

customer_reviews.title: Completely satisfied!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my eight month old granddaughter, who came to visit for an extended weekend. My son, daughter-in-law, and granddaughter flew in from another state. They did not want to hassle with hauling the car seat in addition to their luggage. Was easy to set up and operate. Felt the baby was very secure riding in it. And hopefully we will get plenty of use from it with not only our one granddaughter for now, but more grandchildren in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Easy in and out of the car. The seat part easily washes. It is heavy, but I find that to be a good thing. I want the seat to protect my little love, so heavy translates into a good thing to me.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Even after a year of use and several family members ...
customer_reviews.text: Even after a year of use and several family members using it. This car seat is always time consuming and DIFFICULT to get a child in and out of.
customer_reviews.author: Net

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love it! Great seat. Never had any issues with it. My kid loves it, belts are great.
customer_reviews.author: Evgeniy L.

customer_reviews.title: Best available
customer_reviews.text: Very heavy duty, safe car seat. It is bulky, but that's to be expected with the extra layers of side padding.
customer_reviews.author: Cgiacomi

customer_reviews.title: Great Car seat!
customer_reviews.text: Britax is of course an amazing brand. Their car seats maybe a little heavy but that just means they are anchored well. Which I don't know about you but that means my child is just that much more safe. We love this car seat and on Amazon is where we found our best price!
customer_reviews.author: Erik Loggins

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: good quality but hard to work with. It has been impossible to readjust it.
customer_reviews.author: Edwin

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Best car seat ever, super simple to install, felt way more secure than other seats
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install. Provides superior protection. My grandson actually likes sitting in it much better than in his former car seat.
customer_reviews.author: 5bobbi9

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love it!! Easy to instal and my sons head is no longer bobbing around
customer_reviews.author: Jaz

customer_reviews.title: Great car seat
customer_reviews.text: I feel like this is the safest car seat available. I love the straps and head support. Well worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Emily Hashberger

customer_reviews.title: Great, sturdy seat
customer_reviews.text: Great, sturdy seat. Easy to install once you know what you are doing. I watched the videos on the Britax website and it made it all easier.
customer_reviews.author: Kvato

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: Love this car seat and so does my daughter! It was sooo easy to install and the britax safety ratings are great!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great car seat
customer_reviews.text: What a upgrade from the infant seat. Solid and safe
customer_reviews.author: Brian M

customer_reviews.title: very easy to remove and put in cars
customer_reviews.text: cannot go cheap on safety. bought for our toddler. very easy to remove and put in cars. we love it!
customer_reviews.author: Mfav1

customer_reviews.title: Great car seat
customer_reviews.text: Great car seat bought as a gift to my sisters son and she loves it.
customer_reviews.author: SD

customer_reviews.title: Wanted to love the seat but I am retuning it
customer_reviews.text: Wanted to love the seat but I am retuning it. The crotch buckle is very short and I could not get a proper fit on my small 11 month old.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: My fat baby looks like a sausage in this thing
customer_reviews.text: No joke when they said ClickTIGHT. My fat baby looks like a sausage in this thing.
customer_reviews.author: ARRRRRRRRFFF

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: It's a pretty good car seat. It fits perfectly in my SUV and also my daughter (8 months) rides with no issue. Last time I was stuck for 45 minutes in traffic and my daughter was completely slept. I wouldn't imagine that in my last car seat, I was scared of red lights and traffic. But with Britax my wife and I don't fear them anymore
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy. Difficult to work at first but once you get how to maneuver it, easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Viviana Mercado

customer_reviews.title: Best convertible seat, hands down!
customer_reviews.text: This is an incredibly impressive car seat that feels much stronger, sturdier and solid than others we have tried (e.g., Maxi-Cosi Pria 85). The ClickTight system is the best I have ever seen -- the seat will not budge in the least -- and it is very easy to use. While it might be heavier that competing products, that's what adds to its safety and awesomeness.
customer_reviews.author: JMP

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable for the child
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable for the child. Safe. I only gave it 4 stars bc the straps twist quite frequently, making it difficult to buckle. It seems you have to wrestle with the chair, trying to buckle the child. It is also a little heavy, but overall, we like it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Seems comfortable and as easy to use as a 4 way ...
customer_reviews.text: Seems comfortable and as easy to use as a 4 way belt buckling process and a 1yr old can be.
customer_reviews.author: Chando

customer_reviews.title: Great buy. I like Britax seats
customer_reviews.text: 2nd advocate. I'm very happy with Britax. installation was very easy, it helps if you read and watch demos.
customer_reviews.author: krpr

customer_reviews.title: Try in store first - crotch strap is too short
customer_reviews.text: As other reviewers have stated, the crotch strap is way too short and digs into my daughter's thighs. She's exactly average height and weight at 13 months old. I contacted Britax to see if they have a fix and they do not. I realize that children come in all different shapes and sizes this car seat might work out great for some. I just urge you to try it out in a store if possible before purchasing. I do love the CT mechanism, but unfortunately that's not enough.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica M

customer_reviews.title: So far we love this seat
customer_reviews.text: So far we love this seat. Very easy to move from car to car when sending baby with grandparents or traveling in a friend's car. Recommend you tube videos for installation and set up. Very helpful.
customer_reviews.author: rmbickle

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: solid construction-doesn't budge when you lock it in- very easy to take out and move cars.
customer_reviews.author: Dearlady

customer_reviews.title: Solid sturdy carseat - very easy to install with seatbelts
customer_reviews.text: Top of the line, sturdy carseat. The ClickTight feature is awesome for my older car with seatbelts - or even to use in a middle backseat of a newer car where there aren't Latch connectors. Only downside is the button to release the buckles is pretty hard to use - you really have to push your finger in there to get it to release! Hard for any grandparents with arthritis to use. Otherwise, it's a great seat and we love it. Much easier to install with a lapbelt than the Graco 4Ever 4 in 1 - which we also own.
customer_reviews.author: JHMV

customer_reviews.title: Great for newborns all the way to booster
customer_reviews.text: Love these car seats - 6lb newborn looks very snug and safe, started with a cheapy car seat that attatched to a stroller and I didn't feel confident in the car seats safety at all. I did have to roll up a towel to get it to stay reclined properly-
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Confident
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my son's daughter not yet born. She is worth it!!!
customer_reviews.author: Toni

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: All seems to be perfect. Product was as described and it arrived in time.
customer_reviews.author: Diego Pistoletti Dovenna

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves this for my granddaughter it might seem pricey but it's well worth it.
customer_reviews.author: George Long

customer_reviews.title: Love the new click tight design
customer_reviews.text: Love the new click tight design! Very easy to install and this model in particular is very padded and comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole G.

customer_reviews.title: Love this! It's not that difficult if you read ...
customer_reviews.text: Love this! It's not that difficult if you read the instructions correctly. It is heavy but I believe that's just the good quality of it. We bought this for my son when he turned one. he's 15 months now. It should last us a while.
customer_reviews.author: Megan Grossman

customer_reviews.title: Very good quality. One of the best car seats I ...
customer_reviews.text: Very good quality. One of the best car seats I have used. Would recommend it for use with any child.
customer_reviews.author: Todd

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING!!!!
customer_reviews.text: We love love love our Britax ClickTight! So easy to use and install and fits perfect in my car. Also love the sleek and clean looking design of the Circa!
customer_reviews.author: Brittney

customer_reviews.title: Rear tethering
customer_reviews.text: For rear-facing tethering you will want the optional anti rebound bar, since now is the only option recommended, but is overpriced for a piece of metal (the anti rebound bar)

customer_reviews.title: Seriously the BEST car seat on the market
customer_reviews.text: Seriously the BEST car seat on the market! I will forever be a Britax fan and will continue to buy their products for our future kids!

customer_reviews.title: Safety for the grandkids
customer_reviews.text: It's one of the safest seats for our granddaughters. Everything seems to work great.

customer_reviews.title: It is pretty good, nice color
customer_reviews.text: It is pretty good, nice color, nice size, looks comfortable and safe, the only problem is the sound that came from the knob adjuster Click Tight (with or with out my son)
customer_reviews.author: Juan T

customer_reviews.title: Great seat - built like a tank
customer_reviews.text: This is pretty easy to install and feels heavy duty. It had great reviews on consumer reports and seems like my son is protected in a tortoise shell. I would buy this one again.
customer_reviews.author: RW

customer_reviews.title: This is the best car seat
customer_reviews.text: This is the best car seat! If it was available as an adult seat we would buy it. It's super comfortable and cozy. It's easy to install, buckle and adjust. And it has a steal frame so it's one of the SAFEST on the market! Our daughter use to cry when she had to go in her infant seat- and shed cry when we were on the road. It was miserable for everyone. Now, she just hangs out and is along for the ride. It's a little expensive but definitely worth it! And because it's a reliable and well known brand you could resell it once your done with it.
customer_reviews.author: Krissy B

customer_reviews.title: Awesomely safe
customer_reviews.text: Amazing seat, so safe and cozy. A little heavy and big so check your cars capacity before buying.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Britax Advocate ClickTight Convertible Car Seat, Circa
product_meta.description: This No.1 rated convertible has a groundbreaking installation that leaves you with no doubt the seat is safely and correctly installed. 3 layers of side impact protection, a snug harness indicator, an impact absorbing base and steel frame make for the best protection for your child. Typically up to 75 percent of car seats are installed incorrectly, but the revolutionary ClickTight Installation System is the safest and easiest technology on the market. Just open the front of the car seat, buckle the seat belt across and click the seat shut. That's all you need to do for rock solid installation the seat won't budge and you can travel worry free with your child. Britax is the only child car seat brand that features world class SafeCell Impact Protection. This integrated system of safety components provides unmatched protection for your child. These features include a steel frame, energy absorbing base, V shaped tether to minimize seat rotation and staged release stitches that slow and reduce forward movement during a crash. Side impacts represent 25 percent of collisions and result in the most severe injuries. Britax designed the Advocate ClickTight with these statistics in mind. The seat has a deep foam lined shell, quick adjust head protection and side cushions, forming 3 layers of side protection the best protection for your child. Almost 60 percent of car seat harnesses are too loose. Britax's patented Click & Safe Snug Harness Indicator takes the guesswork out of seating your little one and lets you know that your child's harness is within range of proper tightness with a click sound. Britax developed the Advocate ClickTight to safely and comfortably hold your child from birth all the way through the preschool years. The easy adjust harness grows along with your child with 14 different positions. Change the height of the seat with just the push of a button no inconvenient rethreading necessary.
feature_bullets: Easy installation: Patented Click Tight makes car seat installation as simple as buckling a seat belt
No rethreading, ever: Quick adjust 14 position harness with Click & Safe Snug Indicator gives a click sound when the harness is tight
Adjust accurately: Harness indicator gives an audible click when you’ve pulled to the proper tightness
Surrounded in safety: 3 layers of side impact protection, quick adjust head protection, steel frame and impact absorbing base
Fits: Rear facing 5 to 40 pounds and forward to facing 20 to 65 pounds; Dimensions: 23L x 20.5W x 23.5H inches
